short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read less, learn more. AI-powered summaries for faster reading.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get instant summaries of webpages using AI! This extension uses advanced natural language processing to extract the key points from any website, saving you time and effort. No more sifting through lengthy articles or reports - just click and get a concise summary in seconds.

Available in English only.
